labels.optionImgInstrText: This image will override the standard product image
labels.bundleOptionText: Bundle my selections into one option
labels.validQtyError: Please enter a valid quantity value
labels.historyOptionAction: ${optionName} Option in ${pageName} Page the Action field was updated
labels.multiSelectText: Allow the user to select more than one option?
labels.optionExpiredFlagConfigSet: One or more products in this Configuration Set have been discontinued.
labels.allowFirstpageInformationAndMultiselectN: This page ${pageName} is the first page of the flow. The first page of the flow should be a Information Page type and should NOT allow user to select more than one option. Please create and/ or sort a Information Page to the top of the list.
labels.mandatoryPageWithoutOptionsError: This page is a Mandatory page. It should have at-least one option defined for user navigation.
labels.allowFirstPageMultiSelectNo: This page ${pageName} is the first page of the flow. The first page of the flow should NOT allow user to select more than one option.
labels.gwpAdminconsole: Guided Web Purchasing Administrator Console allows you to:
labels.pgExistsError: Page Name already exists. Please enter a unique page name
labels.END_OF_PATH_NOT_DEFINED: End of Flow not defined! Please select End of Path as Action for the last options of the flow.
labels.descriptionLimitMsg: The description field has been shortened to 220 characters
labels.optionDescTextMissingMessage: Please enter a Description for this Option
labels.orphanPageError: This page ${pageName} is an orphan page in the flow. Please refer this page elsewhere in the flow or make it inactive to not include in the flow .
labels.fileUploadError: Option image was not uploaded successfully. Please try again.
labels.gwpBannerFlow4: The image will appear after the next “Publish”.
labels.gwpBannerFlow3: Once desired image is chosen, select upload to activate image on pages.
labels.optionExpiredFlagTable: one or more parts in this option have been discontinued
labels.gwpBannerFlow1: Allows you to upload an image that will appear on each page of the Guided web purchasing flow.
labels.byodMNoPages: There are no pages in this GWP. </br> Add a page to begin.
labels.gwpPageName: Page name has to be unique and spaces are not allowed in the field. The following characters are allowed: a thru z, 0 thru 9, hyphen and underscore.
labels.allowFirstPageInformationPageWithNoOptio: This page ${pageName} is the first page of the flow. The first page of the flow should be a Information Page type
labels.byodgwptitleonly: Manage Web Groups: Guided Web Purchasing
labels.showDescAndProdLinks: Show Product Descriptions and Product Links
labels.gwpTipsContent: Guided web purchasing (GWP) is a step by step purchasing experience for the end user to build their shopping cart. Every linked user of the web group will be able to access the guided web purchasing flow from the web group’s welcome page.
labels.BYOD_OPTION_ACTION_ERROR: Invalid Action! Please select a valid Action for this Option. Action links the next page for the user when this option is selected
labels.byodMDeleteOptionPopupMesg: Are you Sure you want to delete this Option?
labels.gwpTestErrorsOption2: Table view will retain the error description against the pages and options that have issues. Click on the error icon in the Status column to see page specific error messages.
labels.gwpPreviewFlow1: Allows administrator to duplicate the flow as it will work in production.
labels.gwpTestErrorsOption3: Update pages and option and click Test again to close the errors.
labels.gwpPreviewFlow2: All pages will display as configured.
labels.gwpPreviewFlow3: Administrator will not be able to place an order.
labels.gwpTestErrorsOption1: Use the Manage Pages drop down to Test the flow for errors. If there are any errors, a pop with a brief description of the issue will be provided.
labels.notMandatorySkipActionMessage: This page is not Mandatory for the end user. Please define SKIP action to create page navigation for the end user.
labels.configSetsImported: Config sets imported from company standards
labels.gwpNavigationOutWarningMesg: This GWP has changes that have not been published.
labels.firstPageNonMandatoryError: First Page of the flow has to be Mandatory for the user.
labels.addOptsManuallyBundleInstr: Paste Material IDs below separated by comma. These material IDs will be bundled together as a single option.
labels.gwpCreateNewPageOption4: Based upon the page type selected in the Settings tab, related functionality to create options is available in the Options tab.
labels.gwpCreateNewPageOption5: A page with at least one option that requires a part/ material ID should be categorized as Product Page.
labels.gwpCreateNewPageOption6: Information Page do not require parts or material IDs in any option. Examples of such page would be category pages, pages that require user to make a choice but the selection does not have to include a product.
labels.gwpCreateNewPageOption1: Use the Manage Pages drop down to Add New Page.
labels.gwpCreateNewPageOption2: Complete all Mandatory fields in the Page Setting tab.
labels.gwpCreateNewPageOption3: Click UPDATE to save the page and begin to add options.
labels.gwpNextActionOption2: If a page not Mandatory for the user, Action for that page is required to create end user navigation. In a non-mandatory page user can continue to next page without selecting any option in that page.
labels.gwpNextActionOption1: Action field for options establishes the Next button click action for the end user. The Action list will include all active pages saved in the GWP flow. Every option should have an action to publish the flow.
labels.invalidMaterailIdError: The following material ID's are invalid :
labels.maxFilesizeError: Image file size cannot be larger than 2 Megabyte.
labels.optionActionMissingMessage: This option does not have ‘Action’ defined. An ‘Action’ is required for every option to create page navigation for end user.
labels.noHistory: There are no recent changes to the Guided Web Purchasing Flow.
labels.recommendedText: Recommend this Option for end user
labels.individualOptionsText: Create individual options from my selections
labels.allowMultipleSelectionsMesg: If ${pageName} has to Allow user to select multiple options,then all options in this page should have similar actions.Please update Actions for all the options and then change the page settings.
labels.gwpMandatoryStep: If a page is NOT mandatory, a SKIP action has to be set up to enable user navigation when no option is selected.
labels.gwpPageType:
Information Page: Options in this page do not require any parts/material IDs.
Product Page: At least one option in this page requires a part/material ID.
labels.gwpWebGroupsOption1: GWP flow will have to be published in the web group’s Welcome Page to be made available for the end user.
labels.byodPreviewChanges: This GWP has changes that have not been published.
labels.gwpWebGroupsOption2: Under Manage Pages click on Welcome page content. A pop up with two options – Link Code and Embed Code will be available. Copy the code you wish to have in the welcome page.
labels.gwpWebGroupsOption3: Link Code with a custom button can be published in the welcome page.
labels.gwpWebGroupsOption4: Embed code will set in the 1st page options in the welcome page. Any changes to the 1st page properties or options, the welcome page content will need to be generated and pasted in the welcome page settings.
labels.imagePublishError: Option images were not published successfully. Please try again.
labels.importAsBundle: Import Config Set(s) as one option
labels.bannerTitle: Upload a banner that will show at the top of each page.
labels.documentAndFileSizeInfo:
Valid File Types: XLS, XLSX, PDF, PPT, PPTX, DOC, DOCX
Max file size: 30 MB
labels.firstPageInactiveError: The first page of the flow has to be an Active Page.
labels.gwpInactivePage: Inactive pages are not published for the end user.
labels.gwpManagePagesOption4: Sort page when in collapsed mode by drag and drop.
labels.gwpManagePagesOption5: Make pages Inactive to exclude from the end user flow.
labels.optionEmptyMaterialIdMessage: This product page option does not have any material IDs. Add a Material ID to update this option.
labels.gwpAction: Actions build page navigation for end user. Select End Of Path when user is at the end of the flow ready to add items to transaction cart. A Start Over action navigates the user to the 1st page of the flow to start new.
labels.longMaterialIdError2: Please modify and select Import Options.
labels.gwpViewHistoryOption1: Use the Manage Pages drop down to View recent changes that were published to the Guided Web Purchasing flow.
labels.invalidDocumentType: Invalid file format. Only GIF, JPEG and PNG file types are supported.
labels.gwpViewHistoryOption2: The system saves change history between two recent published versions.
labels.longMaterialIdError1: The following parts were entered incorrectly:
labels.gwpWebGroups: Build the web group’s  welcome page content
labels.optionImgText: Upload a picture to represent this option
labels.addOptsManuallyInstr1: Paste Material IDs below separated by comma. Each material ID will be added as a separate choice.
labels.addOptsManuallyInstr2: Default part information will be pulled in for each option. You can customize the options later.
labels.gwpManagePagesOption2: Click on any row in the table view to get a drop down icon on the right side of the row.
labels.gwpManagePagesOption3: The drop down lets you to duplicate page or delete page, duplicate an option or delete an option.
labels.gwpManagePagesOption1: The table view on the left hand side provides a high level view of all the pages, options within them and the Actions associated to the options.
labels.invalidFileNameError: Please select an image file with valid file name.
labels.pgNameValidationError: Page Name field is not valid. Underscore '_' and Hyphen '-' are the only special characters allowed in this field. If you have pasted the name from another application, type the page name again.
labels.addOptsManuallyInstr: Add Materials IDs separated by comma. Default part information will be pulled in. You can customize it later.
labels.allowFirstPageInactiveNo: This page ${pageName} is the first page of the flow. The first page of the flow has to be an Active Page.
labels.importAsIndividual: Import Config Set(s) as indivdual options
labels.historyOptionConfigsetsCreatedOrUpdated: ${optionName} Option in ${pageName} Page the Config Sets were updated
labels.gwpPublishForEndUSerOption1: If there are no errors in the flow, on click of Test, you will be prompted to Publish Now or Publish Later.
labels.gwpPublishForEndUSerOption2: Under Manage Pages, click Publish to publish the flow directly. If there are any errors in the flow, the flow cannot be published.  The errors found pop up will be displayed. Update the pages and publish again.
labels.historyOptionMaterialCreatedOrUpdated: ${optionName} Option in ${pageName} Page the Material IDs were updated
labels.allowFirstPageInformationPage: This page ${pageName} is the first page of the flow. The first page of the flow should be a Information Page type. Please create and/ or sort a Information Page to the top of the list.
labels.allowFirstPageNonMandatoryNo: This page ${pageName} is the first page of the flow. The first page of the flow has to be a Mandatory Page.
labels.cyodCSbrokenLinkInfo: Link to Company Standards is broken
labels.byodgwptitle: Manage Web Groups: Guided Web Purchasing (new)
labels.byodMDeletePopupMesg: Are you Sure you want to delete this Page?
labels.withoutMaterialsOptionsText: Create an option without material IDs
labels.gwpPublishPopUpMessg: There were no errors found with your GWP
labels.optionTitleTextMissingMessage: Please enter a Title Name for this Option
labels.breadcrumbError: Please enter breadcrumb text for this page
